title: Avatar 2’s Profound Cowardice, MoviePass Back In Black 09.01.22
itunes:title: Avatar 2’s Profound Cowardice, MoviePass Back In Black 09.01.22
description:
In episode 1322, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian, writer, and co-host of Round Ball Rock, Sean Keane to discuss… MAGA SweatFest...Media Outlets Are Picking Sides, Avatar Has Officially Ditched The Papyrus Font, MoviePass Is Back From The Dead (But May Just Die Again) and more!

  1. Avatar Has Officially Ditched The Papyrus Font
  2. Papyrus font creator reacts to viral "Avatar" skit from "Saturday Night Live"
  3. MoviePass Is Back From The Dead (But May Just Die Again)
  4. MoviePass to relaunch in fall with a waitlist, after shutting down in 2019: ‘Space is limited’
  5. MoviePass will return on September 5th with plans starting at around $10 per month
  6. Brutal Startup Is Using Eye Tracking to Force You to Watch Ads

WATCH: Giant Slide Music Video

LISTEN: La Verdolaga by P18

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
